explanations.reason: The paper focuses on examining the risk-return association within the Capital Asset Pricing Model (CAPM) framework in the Dhaka Stock Exchange (DSE) market. It uses traditional statistical methods like two-stage regression to test the applicability of CAPM. There is no mention or use of machine learning techniques, neural networks, or any other advanced computational methods listed in the keywords. The study is purely based on financial econometrics and does not involve any of the specified machine learning or deep learning approaches.
